resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "Backend Ekyio"
  version: "1.0"
  title: "Ekyio API"
servers:
  - url: "https://ekyio-backend.herokuapp.com/api"
tags:

- name: "user"
  description: ""

- name: "builds"
  description: ""

- name: "weapons"
  description: ""

- name: "stigmatas"
  description: ""

- name: "valkyries"
  description: ""

paths:
  /api/login:
    post:

      description: ""
      parameters:
      - name: "Content-Type"
        in: "header"

        description: ""
